name: jackanalyzer
description: Jack Language Compiler I: Syntax Analyzer

scripts.cleanall: npm run clean && npm run cleanxml && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.cleanxml: rm -rf files/ArrayTest/*.xml && rm -rf files/ExpressionLessSquare/*.xml && rm -rf files/Square/*.xml
scripts.runall: npm run start files/ArrayTest && npm run start files/ExpressionLessSquare && npm run start files/Square

author: David Lin
